review: Hooked it up in seconds went through and tied my ISO system devices iPad and iPhone to it have enjoyed many Netflix movies and TV shows with no buffer problems. It has its limits but more apps are coming all the time. I noted when I selected the movie from my iPad I can close it, turn off the iPad by closing the cover and the movie still plays  one the TV and my iPad does not discharge. Have experienced no problems so I'm giving this a high recommendation

review: When the Chromecast first came out, I looked again into the whole streaming devices, and ended buying a Roku. Before Christmas, Google released a number of additional apps for the Chromecast and I bought one on top the the Roku I already have.Long story short, I end up using the Chromecast much more than the Roku. Both do basically do the same thing but the Chromecast is much easier to use.
